name: Shapeformer - Spring 2018 UE4Jam Submission
description:
A game made by only me for the Spring 2018 Game Jam.

All of the sounds were taken from freesound.org.

The golden Cubes[Material + Mesh] were taken from the Unreal Engine default Project (so shiny - and there isn't much to do differently from that, by Epic Games)

Everything else was created by me during the game jam.

Controlls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Mouse - Turning the camera

Space - Confirming/Jumping

Right Mouse Button - Interact

Escape - Quit Game
